channel.title: Need help with client/items
channel.description: hi guys, 1st. I have Item Editor for editing item graphical look,bonuses and etc. but it doesnt work for me. So if any1 has fully working item editor(which can edit gfx of item) please post a link. 2nd. I have my server, I want to add custom item like in other servers for ex: bronze,iron,steel,mith,addy,rune,dragon whips, custom armor, custom npcs so i need to make private client, pls give me some help how to make my own client, not deltascape and not other, i just wanna make my client with all rs/silab models and some custom stuff...coz now when i try to use something custom i just get kick from server :( Please, help me if can. :o

item.title: Need help with client/items
item.dc:creator: @nabster nabster
item.description:
@nabster wrote:

hi guys,
1st. I have Item Editor for editing item graphical look,bonuses and etc. but it doesnt work for me. So if any1 has fully working item editor(which can edit gfx of item) please post a link.
2nd. Please, help me if can. :o
